b1c1a89a0b6611e5a2aa782bcb074135dca9d493ea3845a488aec73eb281e73b;2018-11-15T16:40:16Z;toolService;toolService:tool;ixa-pipe-coref-eu;ixa-pipe-coref-eu is a Basque coreference resolution tool, which is an adaptation of Stanford Deterministic Coreference Resolution (http://www-nlp.stanford.edu/downloads/dcoref.shtml).

This tool reads a text document annotated with lemmas, named entities and constituents formated in Natural Language Processing Annotation Format (NAF) (http://wordpress.let.vupr.nl/naf/) and outputs a new NAF document.

This tool is partly funded by the European Commission project QTLeap FP7-ICT-2013.4.1-610516 (http://qtleap.eu). This tool is distributed under the license GPL v3.0.;2015-06-05
name: 23c17fa0-5f03-5950-90d1-d50d82490b40
notes:
ixa-pipe-coref-eu is a Basque coreference resolution tool, which is an adaptation of Stanford Deterministic Coreference Resolution (http://www-nlp.stanford.edu/downloads/dcoref.shtml).

This tool reads a text document annotated with lemmas, named entities and constituents formated in Natural Language Processing Annotation Format (NAF) (http://wordpress.let.vupr.nl/naf/) and outputs a new NAF document.

This tool is partly funded by the European Commission project QTLeap FP7-ICT-2013.4.1-610516 (http://qtleap.eu). This tool is distributed under the license GPL v3.0.
title: ixa-pipe-coref-eu
